title: HEALLILY 3PCS/Set Hair Dryer Comb Attachment Professional Hair Dryer Comb Nozzle Hairdressing Styling Salon Tool for Barber Shop blow dryer attachment 15x13x6cm(Black)
features: 【Great Compatibility】Fit with most blow dryers with nozzle 6-7cm. The base will stretch and hug your blow dryer. All you need is to push it down and make it snug.
【Sturdy and Durable】Made from heavy-duty material for long lasting use. Heat-resistant and sturdily-built without the frustrating issues of breaking or bending teeth.

【Dual Teeth Design】The black concentrates air flow to detangle and straighten your hair in 1 step. The small ,extra set of teeth at the base of the comb made all of the difference, your hair would be combed twice with each pass, making your hair super smooth and straight.
【Applications】Work great to maintain straight hair, and also a great helper for the people with curly, natural, black hair to straighten up their hair a little.

【Important Note】Blow dryers over 2000W with AC fans motor, DC motor, or on high settings are not recommended for use with the diffuser. Please use the comb attachment on low heat/low speed setting at first.
description: Fit with most blow dryers. Professional hair dryer comb attachment. It can deliver the powerful wind, and concentrate the wind. Reduce the wastage, prolong the service life. Could let your hair dry within few minutes.
- Material: Plastic.- Color: Black.- Size: 15 x 13 x 6 cm.
